title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: The Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (MSPRH) is the health ministry of Republic of Algeria. It is located in El Madania, a municipality of Algiers. The Ministry is responsible for public health facilities and population monitoring. The Minister is a member of the Council of ...

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (Algeria) | GHDx
snippet: Formerly named the Ministry of Health and Population (Ministère de la Santé et de la Population).

title: Dr. Sania Nishtar | Community Health Delivery Partnership CHDP
snippet: During her career, Dr Nishtar has fulfilled several leadership positions in civil society and international organisations. She founded the non-profit NGO think tank Heartfile, which campaigns for health reform in Pakistan.

title: Ministry of Health and Population (Egypt) - Wikipedia
snippet: Khaled Abdel Ghaffar, the current Health Minister, was appointed in October 2021. Hatem El-Gabaly (31 December 2005 – 31 January 2011) Ahmed Sameh Farid (31 January 2011 – 22 February 2011)
